title: Comedy Today, Ice T, Godfather of Harlem and more.
itunes:title: Comedy Today, Ice T, Godfather of Harlem and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  The show for today is dedicated to all monkey owners.  Eddie Murphy is not too fond of the comedy that he did back in the day.  R. Kelly wants out of jail due to health reasons.  Ice T and Coco are in support of one another when it comes to the breast feeding of their three year old daughter.  Miss Carla reminds us of the breast cancer event this Saturday in Chicago.  The Godfather of Harlem is out and it stars Forrest Whitaker playing the role of Bumpy Johnson.  Tommy has his list of favorite actors and Steve shares his opinion.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about talking to God and why.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
